description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jul 2020,Chicken,Spinach,Dairy free
name: Chicken Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 spring onions (white and green parts separated)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill food flasks with boiling water and set aside.
Heat extra virgin olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan or wok over high heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until lightly browned. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
Add garlic and white part of onion to pan and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Add carrot, peas and broccoli and cook, stirring, for a further 5 minutes or until softened.
Return chicken to pan. Add rice, soy sauce and sesame oil, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until rice is warmed through. Add spinach and stir to combine.
Drain water from flasks and dry well. Spoon in rice, top with green part of onion, then serve.
Change up the vegetables if your child has other favourites, such as swapping out the peas for corn, or the broccoli for cauliflower.
